title: My First Blog Post
content: This is my first blog post using a JSON file. I'm excited to share my thoughts here!

title: Responsive Design Tips
content: Responsive design ensures your website looks great on all devices. Use flexible layouts, media queries, and scalable units like percentages and ems.

title: Thinking About My Future Master's
content: I’ve just started my BSc in Computing,ah yeah i chose it and I’m already thinking ahead about a possible Master's in cybersecurity or quantum computing. I plan to use this blog to track my learning, explore tech topics, and reflect on my journey. I am interested in Both CYber Security and Quantum computing what a dilema
